A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The biggest sin of this movie (and the TFA's as well) - beside the many other issues - is that they totally and utterly destroyed Luke's character. To say that Luke considered killing Ben while he was sleeping is closely the biggest possible insult they could have done to Luke - and the original trilogy. Disney stabbed Star Wars right in the heart in a way that is beyond all comprehension... I still can't believe they did this.
